properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:20AM CST until January 5 at 1:12PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo...Sumter and Tuscaloosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is expected to fall over the next 48 hours...
and a flood warning is now in effect. The river levels are based
on forecasted rainfall totals and river levels may change
depending on actual rainfall amounts...

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* from late Friday night to Sunday afternoon...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At  7:30 AM Wednesday The stage Was 110.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Saturday morning and
continue to rise to near 130.7 feet by early Saturday afternoon.
The river will fall below flood stage by early Sunday morning.
* Impact...At 132 feet...Flooding of rural roads southwest of
Tuscaloosa occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
